summary: The module processes simulation log files generated by the TLO framework to extract and analyze measles‑related mortality data. It computes summary statistics, aggregates results across runs, and produces visualizations of death trends over time, facilitating interpretation of the simulated impact of measles dynamics and interventions.
business_intent: To provide public‑health analysts and policymakers with quantitative insights into measles mortality patterns derived from simulation experiments, enabling evidence‑based assessment of intervention strategies and resource allocation.
